v8:item.v8:content: Manage users, configure access groups, grant access to external users, and manage user settings.
Set passwords, configure password complexity, and deny access for inactive users.
Records the following events to the event log: changes in access group values, profiles roles, access role rights, and user group membership.
"User monitoring" administrator reports, which contain data on user rights, activities, and settings.
Provides your partners with remote access to the app.
Manage the list of external users who have remote access to the app.
Access groups, profiles, and record-level restrictions
Fine-tune access rights to catalogs, documents, and other data.

High-performance mode is recommended for the client/server infobase, where it is much more efficient than the standard mode.
In a multiuser file infobase, it might restrict the performance of concurrent users, so the standard mode would be preferable.
If there is only one user in the file infobase or data is entered by multiple users not intensively, the high-performance mode imposes no further restrictions and will speed up viewing lists and generating reports compared to the standard mode.
Allow access restrictions by partner groups.
Cannot turn off access restrictions by partners as access is allowed to external users only (see below).
Allow access restrictions by product groups.
Create additional partner groups to restrict access to catalogs, documents, and other data.
Create additional product groups to restrict access to data.
Manage user settings for reports, user interface, and other features.
Clear settings for all or selected users.
Logging of access events according to Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On personal data" issued on July 27, 2006.
Possible reasons for data destruction: the subject's consent expired or the consent is missing.
Decoration Wait for personal data destruction settings to change
View events of access to personal data (object-wise).
Event logging for data access auditing.

View the access rights update progress. If any issues occur, you can perform the following actions manually: - Update access rights for a single object. - Schedule access rights update for specific lists.
